page.title: 16Transport in Codnor
page.content:
Codnor is served very well by buses. These services stop in Codnor: 330 Hucknall to Alfreton 231 Nottingham to Ripley 132 Derby to Heanor
There is a private coach firm called Dunn-Line with 11 coaches, and a taxi firm called Apex Cars. If you want to catch a train, the nearest station is Alfreton-Mansfield Parkway for direct trains to Sheffield Nottingham,Leicester and London. The A610 Nottingham-Ambergate road goes through Codnor so it gets very busy.Traffic lights have just been put up to make it better, but the village needs a by-pass, especially now that the Ripley and Langley Mill ones have been completed. The A6007 is the road to Heanor, and a B road goes to Riddings and Alfreton. {GH/PS/CR
